actions.abilityText: I & [B]: Prevent the enemy monster from switching.
When the enemy monster switches, that monster is dealt 3[ATK] and discard this aura. If all time counters are removed from this aura, [+] [+].
[2]: The targeted monster gains a leech condition. ~LEECH~
This attack deals +2[ATK] when this monster has a lockdown counter on it.

buffs.buffText: This monster gains +2[ATK] stat cubes if the enemy monster performed a switch action this turn.
This monster gains +2[ATK] stat cubes if the enemy monster performed a switch action this turn.
[-] [-]: Attack speeds are reversed this turn and you win all ties (slower moves happen first).
This card has no buff effect.

abilityText: At the start of each turn put a lockdown counter on this monster if it doesn't already have one. If it does, remove the lockdown counter instead. While this monster has a lockdown counter on it, the enemy monster cannot perform switch actions.
